doc.after: In 2004 the foundation appointed Tim Starling as developer liaison to help improve the MediaWiki software Daniel Mayer as chief financial officer finance budgeting and coordination of fund drives and Erik M ller as content partnership coordinator In May 2005 the foundation announced seven more official appointments 81 better source needed
